page.title: 18Leisure Activities Contd.
page.content: The village also has a very successful drama group called Potterspury Players who regularly produce plays. There is also a junior section of the group who's last production was 'Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat'. The Potterspury Foundation is a fund-raising committee in the village who are responsible for organising a very large two day show called the 'Festival of Transport' with the sole aim of raising money to be spent in the village on large projects. This year, 1985, the event is being held in the Milton Keynes Bowl and 30,000 people are expected to attend.
